gameworld.world

Interface Inventory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bag, Chest, PlayerInventory

    public interface Inventory
    Can contain items. May be an Item itself (eg a wallet, backpack) or a StaticEntity (eg a chest). Also could be an Inventory for a player.
    Author:
    Kelsey Jack 300275851

    • Method Summary

      Removes i from the inventory if it contains i.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        boolean addItem(Item i)
        Attempts to add i to the inventory. The inventory may be at capacity and not allow the addition though.
        Parameters:
        i - Item to be added
        Returns:
        True if there was space and the item was added, false otherwise.

      • removeItem

        boolean removeItem(Item i)
        Removes i from the inventory if it contains i.
        Parameters:
        i -
        Returns:
        True for successful removal, false if the item wasn't present.

      • getContents

        java.util.List<Item> getContents()

        void empty()
